title: Pakistan Red Crescent Society delegation visits Saudi Red Crescent Authority
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 8 (APP): Pakistan Red Crescent Society (PRCS), Chairman Sardar Shahid Ahmed Laghari on Thursday visited Saudi Arabia along with the delegation and was welcomed by President of the Saudi Red Crescent Authority (SRCA) Dr. Jalal bin Mohammed Al-Owaisi.
According to PRCS spokesman the visit is bound to bolster cooperation and help share expertise in humanitarian aid and relief efforts,
SRCA and PRCS explored avenues for collaboration, highlighting the importance of continuous dialogue and united humanitarian action.
Al-Owaisi President of SRCA commended the strong partnership between SRCA and PRCS, and emphasized their commitment to relief, humanitarian, and volunteer work under the umbrella of the International Federation of Red Cross and SRCA.
The Pakistani delegation was given a comprehensive overview of SRCAâ€™s volunteer platform, training programs, and community awareness initiatives, and toured key facilities, including the Air Ambulance Operations Center and the National Ambulance Center. Pakistani delegation also witnessed firsthand the specialized vehicles deployed by SRCA during emergencies and crises.
